translation.en: [Afro's father] Wait here, son.
[Afro's father] It'll soon be over.
[Justice] Remember me, No.1?
I've been waiting a very long time for this.
[Afro's father] I know.
"No.1" But, it all ends here.
[Justice] Come on, man.
Gimme whatcha got.
Finally…
I've got the title of No.1 in my hand.
Do… not… avenge… me.
[Justice] With this band across my forehead…
I will rule this world as God himself.
translation.zh: 我就能像神一样支配世界

translation.en: [Justice] It's unfortunate that you had to see this, boy.
This moment will always haunt you.
translation.zh: 你会时常回想起这一刻

translation.en: You will be consumed by hatred for me.
Challenge me when you're ready to duel a god.
translation.zh: 你准备好挑战神的时候 来找我吧

translation.en: Ha, ha, ha!
Ha, ha, ha!
[ronin] This is the end of the road…
Afro Samurai!
We got 20 guys here all armed to the teeth,
translation.zh: 这里有20个全副武装的人

translation.en: we got you surrounded.
We never said we were gonna play fair.
translation.zh: 我们没打算和你公平决斗

translation.en: I got no idea why,
but some pretty rich folks wanna pay top dollar for that cloth.
translation.zh: 但一些有钱人出重金要你的头带

translation.en: Why don't you… give it up, kid.
translation.zh: 你还是交出来吧 孩子

translation.en: Everybody's a tough guy… Okay, have it your way.
translation.zh: 想充硬汉 好吧 你自找的

translation.en: Gear-up boys!
Look at this boys!
Tough guy here's gonna take us out with only one hand on his sword.
translation.zh: 勇士打算单手持刀将我们消灭

translation.en: Cut him up!
[assassin 1] What the fu… That's impossible!
[assassin 2] You son of a…
[assassin 3] Fucking fucker! I cut you! I cut you!
translation.zh: 该死的 我要砍死你 砍死你！

translation.en: [ronin] I took this job because…
I thought you were just a legend.
translation.zh: 我以为你只是一个传说

translation.en: Just a story… a story to scare little kids.
But you're the real deal the Demon who dares to challenge God.
translation.zh: 但你真的很强 敢于挑战神的恶魔

translation.en: So what the hell do you want?
Don't seem to me
like you out to make this stinkin' world a better place.
translation.zh: 想让这个肮脏的世界变得更美好

translation.en: Why you gotta kill all my men?
Why you gotta kill me?
[Afro] Nothing personal, it's just revenge.
translation.zh: 不是针对你 这只是复仇

translation.en: [Ninja-Ninja] Yo yo yo yo yo, Afro!
translation.zh: 哟 哟 哟 爆炸头

translation.en: [Ninja-Ninja] That was off the chain!
Cold blooded! Damn, motherfucker!
translation.zh: 真冷血 靠 混蛋

translation.en: Excuse me for probing, but what you just did back there,
translation.zh: 冒昧说一句 你刚才所做的

translation.en: was it absolutely necessary?
I'm beginning to wonder
if you got any feeling for human life left in you at all.
Hey, hey, hey. If you don't stop diss'in me,
translation.zh: 嘿嘿嘿 如果你再这样侮辱我

translation.en: I'm gonna stop followin' your brutal ass around.
Then whose gonna watch your back?
Anyway,
I did check some monk-looking bald motherfucker in a tree
translation.zh: 有个像和尚的光头在树上

translation.en: chattin' on a celly while watchin' your killin' spree.
translation.zh: 一边看你大杀四方一边打手机

translation.en: Don't that bother you? Sure as hell bother me.
translation.zh: 你不在意吗？我挺在意的

translation.en: Yo! Yo!
Hold up! Hold up!
Afro!
[punk] Yo! Yo! Yo!
Breaking news just in!
Huh? What the…
[Kuro] Jeez…
[Okiku] Easy kid.
What's the problem?
It's HIM! He's here! He's here!
translation.zh: 是他 他来了 他来了

translation.en: [Juzo] What the hell are you talking about, punk?
[punk] Ain't no doubt about it, man.
He…
Here. Drink up.
He had this Afro-hairdo… you know what I'm sayin'?
translation.zh: 他是个爆炸头 你知道我说什么吗？

translation.en: With kind of a greenish tint to it if you looked real close.
translation.zh: 如果仔细看 头发还有点绿色

translation.en: And he was wearing this freakin' headband,
with the No.2 stamped high across his freakin' forehead…
translation.zh: 上面写着二号 就在前额

translation.en: [Kihachi] Did you say Afro-hairdo? Greenish tint?
[Kurou] The headband… With No.2 written across it?
[Juzo] Make no mistake…
That's him, that's the No.2.
The AFRO SAMURAI.
The Afro Samurai?
The one who cut down the assassins of the western guild?
translation.zh: 杀光了西方刺客那家伙？

translation.en: Th… The No.2 swordsman of the world?
He's cold blooded!
He killed the brothers of Asura in only five moves.
translation.zh: 他用五刀就解决了阿修罗兄弟

translation.en: So don't think twice about crossing swords with that guy…
[Kihachi] What a bunch of sissies. Screw that, cowards!
translation.zh: 你们这帮懦夫 他妈的

translation.en: You guys just watch while take that No.2 headband.
translation.zh: 你们就等着看我抢到那条二号头带吧

translation.en: That's all bullshit! You assholes just watch!
translation.zh: 胡扯 你们这帮混蛋看着就好

translation.en: I'm gonna take him out!
[patron 1] It's gonna be me!
[patron 2] Let me take him baby! He's all mine.
translation.zh: 他是我的 我会干掉他

translation.en: [patron 3] Naa, I'm gonna be the No.2!
All y'all just shut up!
Cause while you talk and talk and talk,
my spear will be splitting his head in half!
translation.zh: 我的矛已经可以将他的头一分为二

translation.en: Just like this.
[patron] Wow! Hey, man!
Get that rusty piece of junk outta my face, man…
translation.zh: 把你那生锈的废铁从我面前拿开

translation.en: [Soshun] Ma'am…
Yeah?
[Soshun] Why is everyone after this Afro Samurai?
translation.zh:
为什么大家都想干掉这个
爆炸头武士？

translation.en: You don't know? You really must be from out-of-town.
translation.zh: 你不知道？ 你一定是从外地来的

translation.en: We got ourselves a legend around here.
[Soshun] A legend?
[Okiku] Look. Two ancient headbands.
No.1 and No.2.
If you have the No.1, you're like a god.
translation.zh: 如果你拿到一号 你就能像神一样

translation.en: NOBODY can touch you…
Except he who wears… No.2.
translation.zh: 除了戴着二号头带的人

translation.en: The trouble with THAT is―
The trouble with THAT is,
that anyone in the world can challenge you.
translation.zh: 世上任何人都能挑战你

translation.en: Ha ha ha ha!
Clever boy. You're interested?
The life of No.2: constant combat.
translation.zh: 二号的人生就是不断的战斗

translation.en: But ultimately, the path a warrior should take
translation.zh: 但这就是武士该走的路

translation.en: and the reward is to become a god.
Yep. They say the No.1 waits at the top of Mt. Shumi.
translation.zh:
是的 他们说一号就在
须弥山顶上等着

translation.en: You can't miss it.
It's got like 2 huge hand like things…
translation.zh: 那地方看起来像两只巨大的手掌

translation.en: [giant] Get outta my way!
[Kihachi] Take it easy, Mac!
You ain't the only one here who thinks he can take him.
translation.zh: 不只是你一个 认为自己能打败他

translation.en: You caved my eyes in!
translation.zh: 我的眼睛 他打瞎了我的眼睛

translation.en: [Juzo] Fucking son of a bitch!
You warmed up yet?
Hey hey, you wanna fight? Take it outside!
translation.zh: 嘿 要打架就出去外面

translation.en: [Afro] Lemonade… ice cold.
[Okiku] Coming right up. 250 please.
Lemonade… Heh, heh, heh…
[Juzo] Hey man, shut the hell up!
[giant] Now look who we got ourselves here.
[Okiku] Here you are… lemonade.
Drink that, boy. He he he…
Uh, another one?
…on his tab?
[punk] Holy…
[Okiku] Here you are… lemonade.
That's gonna cost you more than 250.
And I think that guy's tab has run out.
translation.zh: 我想那家伙已经没法付钱了

translation.en: That's very cool.
[Afro] Oi-shi… Refreshing…
Good, you'll need it.
You've still got a long way to go, No.2.
translation.zh: 你的路还很长 二号

translation.en: Cross the mountains by way of the "Low Down East" path.
translation.zh: 沿着那条向东的小路穿过那座山

translation.en: Beware of the cliffs, and know that their waiting for you.
translation.zh: 要小心悬崖 你记住他们在等你

translation.en: [Afro] Thanks.
[Ninja-Ninja] Hey Afro! Yo, Fro-boy.
translation.zh: 嘿 爆炸头 爆炸头小子

translation.en: Your sure this is the right way to go?
These cliffs don't look so safe man.
translation.zh: 这些悬崖看起来不太安全

translation.en: And one other thing.
Uh… Don't look now but I think you got a stalker.
translation.zh: 不要望 但我想你被跟踪了

translation.en: A crazy fan boy from the tea house
translation.zh: 从刚才的茶馆 有个疯狂的粉丝

translation.en: and he don't want your autograph, more like your epitaph.
translation.zh: 他不要你的签名 而是你的墓志铭

translation.en: Now, I suggest you keep stepin' cause this one…
translation.zh: 现在 我建议你继续走

translation.en: …is a stone killer, for real.
translation.zh: 因为这家伙是个冷血杀手

translation.en: Yo, didn't you hear me? Get going!
translation.zh: 你没听到我说的吗？继续走

translation.en: I'm trying to pull your coat.
All you gonna do is ignore me?
Alright, alright, you wanna blow it for me and you, huh?
translation.zh: 好吧 你是想害死我们

translation.en: [Afro] Shut up…
Well fine, go on, get your lanky ass killed then.
But don't say I didn't warn ya!
Later!
[Shosun] I am called Shosun.
I come from the land of the great weapon masters of the west.
translation.zh: 我来自盛产武器的西方大陆

translation.en: I see you wear one of the head bands of legend
translation.zh: 我看到你戴着一条传奇的

translation.en: that leads to godhood.
So, shall we?
Afro, don't fight this fucker.
translation.zh: 爆炸头 别和这混蛋打

translation.en: He got arrows and grenades and shit.
You ain't got no chance dude!
Oh, lord, no no no!
Agh! Is you dead?
Don't tell me you dead!
Is you dead? I asked you a question!
Your jumping has only put you
directly in the line of my fire, samurai fool!
translation.zh: 只会让我更容易瞄准 笨蛋武士

translation.en: Where will you go now, great No.2 warrior?
translation.zh: 看你能逃去哪里？二号武士

translation.en: My aim is only to move forward.
[Ninja-Ninja] Whoa! Brother you did your thang!
I thought you was dead for sure!
Yo, my man, I… I gots to tell ya,
translation.zh: 兄弟 我必须跟你说

translation.en: I don't know if it's your natural pheromones
translation.zh: 我不知道是你天生的味道

translation.en: or you need a shower,
but assassins are com'in to us like flies on hot shit.
translation.zh:
刺客们就像闻到屎的苍蝇一样
纠缠不休

translation.en: I gots to say, there's something strange still out there.
translation.zh: 我要说 还会有怪事发生

translation.en: [Brother 1] Hm… Yes…
[Brother 2] It's me! Brother 2.
[Brother 1] Yes… uh-huh, I see… Carry on then.
translation.zh: 我明白了 继续跟踪

translation.en: And remember you are among the righteous few
translation.zh: 要记住 你属于正义一方

translation.en: and we have placed great faith in your ability to track him.
translation.zh: 我们十分信任你的追踪能力

translation.en: Because the No.2 warrior has now begun to move in earnest,
translation.zh: 二号武士已经开始认真行动

translation.en: it seems our cherished brother's work is now truly beginning.
translation.zh:
看来我们亲爱的兄弟的工作
要正式开始了

translation.en: The No.2 walks the path Low Down East…
translation.zh: 二号正在向东方的小路前进

translation.en: [Brother 1] In the great ancestral direction…
Our No.2 warrior's journey will no doubt end
translation.zh: 二号武士的旅程毫无疑问

translation.en: at the great valley before the high slopes of Mt. Shumi.
translation.zh: 会在须弥山前的山谷结束

translation.en: We're getting almost all the data we need.
translation.zh: 我们已经得到大部分需要的数据

translation.en: The mandate of heaven has spoken and agreed with us,
the righteous, the EMPTY SEVEN!
translation.zh: 正义属于我们空空七人教

translation.en: Wash over us, the supreme power!
translation.zh: 无限的力量守护着我们

translation.en: Let us pay homage to the Holy Way.
translation.zh: 让我们向着神圣之路虔诚祈祷吧

translation.en: [Brother 1] Let us close our eyes and feel the power.
translation.zh: 让我们闭上眼睛 感受这股力量

translation.en: Let the Divine roll within you.
translation.zh: 让神圣之力在体内翻滚

translation.en: Let the Holy Way call you.
As the Divine Will has ordained, we have risen from the ashes.
translation.zh:
待神力掌控世间万物
我们将从灰烬中重生

translation.en: …from this condition of oppression,
we have borne the cross, but we will seize the crown…
translation.zh: 我们背负神圣十字 将会夺取王冠

translation.en: and the prophecy shall be fulfilled eye for an eye
translation.zh: 以眼还眼的预言将会应验

translation.en: No.2 shall know no mercy at the hands of the EMPTY SEVEN!
translation.zh:
二号会明白
在空空七人教手里没有仁慈

translation.en: Prepare for the final struggle.
Freedom is in our reach.
The supreme power of God shall be ours!
translation.zh: 神的至高力量必将为我们所有

translation.en: Amen!
Have you heard, my brothers?
[Brothers] Yes!
[Brother 1] Do you hear the word?
[Brothers] right!
[Ninja-Ninja] Man, all these kill'ins are really starting to depress me.
You know what I mean Afro?
Oh, mo' cold shoulder, uh?
[Ninja-Ninja] Yo, Holmes, you're walk'in a little funny.
What's up? Whoa, wassup?
Was it something in the lemonade?
translation.zh: 是不是柠檬汁里加了料？

translation.en: Oh, snap, you fucked up Holmes!
Oh look, oh shit, it was those damn arrows!
translation.zh: 糟糕 是那些该死的箭

translation.en: Come on, Afro, snap out of it man!
translation.zh: 加油 爆炸头 振作点

translation.en: Snap out of it!
[Brother 6] He's injured, I can take him.
translation.zh: 他受伤了 我能干掉他

translation.en: [Brother 2] What?
Hey, hey! Wait! Wait! It's too early!
translation.zh: 嘿 等等 太早了

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey, can't you give a brother a break, yo?
translation.zh:
嘿嘿嘿 你就不能让我兄弟
歇一会吗？

translation.en: Can't you see the man is down?
What about honor and fairness and shit?
translation.zh: 荣耀和公平这些东西呢？

translation.en: Hey, that a motherfuckin' RPG?
translation.zh: 那该死的东西是火箭筒？

translation.en: You got a motherfuckin' RPG?
A RPG in a motherfuckin' backpack?
Wait, wait wait, can we talk about this?
translation.zh: 等等 我们能好好谈谈吗？

translation.en: You ain't got a monologue, you're not gonna give a bad guy speech?
translation.zh:
你也不说几句
你不打算来点反派的独白吗？

translation.en: Oh my god. Oh my god, oh my god…
[Brother 2] That fool!
He may have destroyed the sacred No.2 headband as well!
translation.zh: 他会把二号头带一起毁掉的
